SacredBeast:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
SacredBeast:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

SacredBeast:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
SacredBeast:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
SacredBeast:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

SacredBeast:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
SacredBeast:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

SacredBeast:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
SacredBeast:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !SacredBeast:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

SacredBeast:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
SacredBeast:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !SacredBeast:2M! poison to an enemy.

SacredBeast:Ruffle.NAME: Ruffle
SacredBeast:Ruffle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor if you have none.

SacredBeast:RabidEssence.NAME: Rabid Essence
SacredBeast:RabidEssence.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sacredbeast:Brew !M! sacredbeast:Red Potion. NL Fleeting.
SacredBeast:RabidEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sacredbeast:Brew !M! sacredbeast:Red Potions. NL Fleeting.

SacredBeast:HerbalEssence.NAME: Herbal Essence
SacredBeast:HerbalEssence.DESCRIPTION: sacredbeast:Brew a sacredbeast:Green Potion. NL Fleeting.
SacredBeast:HerbalEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sacredbeast:Brew a sacredbeast:Green Potion. NL Exhaust.

SacredBeast:MysticEssence.NAME: Mystic Essence
SacredBeast:MysticEssence.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, sacredbeast:Brew a sacredbeast:Blue Potion.

SacredBeast:Express.NAME: Express
SacredBeast:Express.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! block, X times

SacredBeast:Dissect.NAME: Dissect
SacredBeast:Dissect.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy
SacredBeast:Dissect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

SacredBeast:Cower.NAME: Cower
SacredBeast:Cower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card if you used a potion this combat.
SacredBeast:Cower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards if you used a potion this combat.

SacredBeast:Brush.NAME: Brush
SacredBeast:Brush.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor, up to !SacredBeast:2M!.

SacredBeast:Trample.NAME: Trample
SacredBeast:Trample.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sacredbeast:Spend !M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor to damage all enemies instead.

SacredBeast:Gore.NAME: Gore
SacredBeast:Gore.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sacredbeast:Spend !SacredBeast:2M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor to apply !M! Vulnerable.
SacredBeast:Gore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sacredbeast:Spend up to !SacredBeast:2M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor to apply that much Vulnerable.

SacredBeast:Smash.NAME: Smash
SacredBeast:Smash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you haven't used a potion this combat, Exhaust.

SacredBeast:SicSemper.NAME: Sic Semper
SacredBeast:SicSemper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return the top card of your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
SacredBeast:SicSemper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return the top card of your discard pile to your hand. NL It costs 1 this turn. NL Exhaust.

SacredBeast:Scamper.NAME: Scamper
SacredBeast:Scamper.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Exhaust the top card of your draw pile.

SacredBeast:Recline.NAME: Recline
SacredBeast:Recline.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor, up to !SacredBeast:3M!. Draw !SacredBeast:2M! cards.

SacredBeast:Pitch.NAME: Pitch
SacredBeast:Pitch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you played a potion this combat, deal !D! damage again.

SacredBeast:Seize.NAME: Seize
SacredBeast:Seize.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SacredBeast:2M! Weak. Gain !M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor. NL Exhaust.

SacredBeast:ToothExtraction.NAME: Tooth Extraction
SacredBeast:ToothExtraction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, sacredbeast:Brew a *Cunning *Potion. NL Exhaust.

SacredBeast:ShedWeight.NAME: Shed Weight
SacredBeast:ShedWeight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength if your first potion slot is empty, and !M! Dexterity if your second is empty.

SacredBeast:AbExtra.NAME: Ab Extra
SacredBeast:AbExtra.DESCRIPTION: Add a random X cost card to your hand. NL It Refunds X this turn.

SacredBeast:Winterize.NAME: Winterize
SacredBeast:Winterize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor. NL Lose !SacredBeast:2M! Dexterity.

SacredBeast:Extrapolate.NAME: Extrapolate
SacredBeast:Extrapolate.DESCRIPTION: Play X [E] worth of cards that Exhaust from your draw pile.
SacredBeast:Extrapolate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play X+1 [E] worth of cards that Exhaust from your draw pile.

SacredBeast:TasteOfLiver.NAME: Taste of Liver
SacredBeast:TasteOfLiver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage & exhaust the top 5 cards of your draw pile. NL Lose all sacredbeast:Plated Armor & gain half that much HP. NL Exhaust.

SacredBeast:Soporifics.NAME: Soporifics
SacredBeast:Soporifics.DESCRIPTION: This turn, the next !M! X-Cost card is played twice
SacredBeast:Soporifics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, the next !M! X-Cost cards are played twice.

SacredBeast:FurFire.NAME: Fur Fire
SacredBeast:FurFire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !SacredBeast:2M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor. NL At the end of your turn, sacredbeast:Spend !SacredBeast:3M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor to deal !M! to all enemies

SacredBeast:Overextend.NAME: Overextend
SacredBeast:Overextend.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top card of your library & deal !D! damage, X times. NL Exhaust.

SacredBeast:PowerWash.NAME: Power Wash
SacredBeast:PowerWash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. sacredbeast:Spend !M! sacredbeast:Plated Armor to add [E].
